hackathon-description-text: The Hopper Storm Hackathon is an all-day power hack during which hackers get access to a huge cluster (30 8-core instances with 32GB RAM and 250GB disk per node) and are set free to create something awesome using Storm.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: A 1-year subscription for compute from SoftLayer.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=51 Sherbrooke Street West, Montreal, QC H2X 1X2, Canada
hackathon-location-address: 51 Sherbrooke Street West, Montreal, QC H2X 1X2, Canada
hackathon-description-header: The Hopper Storm Hackathon is a full day of hacking during which hackers get access to a cluster and mentors and create something awesome using Storm. It's free, and food and caffeine are provided!
